referenceObject.reference: Ruiz, G. R. S. & Brescovit, A. D. (2006a). Gavarilla, a new genus of jumping spider from Brazil, and description of two new species of the genera Capeta Ruiz & Brescovit and Amatorculus Ruiz & Brescovit (Araneae, Salticidae, Sitticinae).
